MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Bodfari, Llandyrnog and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:26PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating the cause of the fault, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.35PM on 25th January 2021
